ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: There are quite a few guilds on kb that fit that description all depending on your timezone. As you may or may not know kb is branded european and most
ygData.messageBody:
There are quite a few guilds on kb that fit that description all
depending on your timezone. As you may or may not know kb is branded
european and most activity take place 18-23 gmt+1.

Raiding everyday guilds would be:
The Celestial Rapture - need level65 and maybe 60-100aa
Midwinter - similar to tcr
Evolutia - us timezone raiders - level65 and some aa.

Scarlet Sun
Blue Frost

Are fairly active and might fit what you are looking for. I do think
your level is a bit low still but 1-30 goes in a few days and I dont
know your current status.

Check out this link on the kb forum, its the recruitment section.

http://pub34.ezboard.com/fkanebayleforumsfrm4

/Alex

-----Original Message-----
From: jersey_jager [mailto:jersey_jager@...]
Sent: den 2 december 2003 12:10
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Server/Guild Help


I am looking for a strong active guild. I thought I had found one.
It had many players they were on all the time and helped out. But
they have had many players leave the guild or leave the server, even
the officers. I would like a supportive guild who do things
together on more than a rare occasion and do not mind a semi
newbie. Even a small guild but who do things and are on more than
once a month.

thanks,
Christine


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Alexander Jones"
<alexander.jones@f...> wrote:
> Im on Kane, what are you searching for really?
>
